metadata.subject: Fwd: US Healthcare Year Ahead...Buy ACAD, AGN, ANTM, CELG, CVS, DHR, EW, EVHC, RARE, REGN, WBA

relationships.description: Kahn forwarding investment advice to Epstein
Kahn receiving investment analysis from Ens
Ens works in Healthcare Specialist Sales at Bank of America Merrill Lynch

transactions: repeal of health insurance exchange subsidies

analysis.purpose: To provide healthcare investment analysis and stock recommendations for 2017 based on political changes
analysis.significance: Shows financial advice being shared with Jeffrey Epstein during transition to Trump administration

notable_quotes: Given the clean sweep by the GOP & uncertainty around the ACA, key attention is paid by Andy Bressler to a review of the various scenarios that could play out early next year.
believe sector will outperform largely as pricing risk has diminished (although will remain in pockets) but pipelines/growth remains.

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found in this financial analysis email

illegal_activity.description: Document contains legitimate financial analysis and investment recommendations with no illegal activity

public_knowledge.context: Standard financial analysis and investment recommendations that would be typical from financial institutions

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn forwards healthcare investment analysis from Bank of America Merrill Lynch to Jeffrey Epstein, providing stock recommendations for 2017 based on anticipated changes to healthcare policy under the incoming Trump administration and GOP control of Congress.
